title: Kaiju Alert Command Center Adventure #53
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Main Control Room
rooms.description: A high-tech command center with wall-sized monitors displaying seismic activity and radar sweeps. Red emergency lights flash overhead. Workstations are covered with papers and equipment. An alarm blares intermittently. The air smells of ozone and burnt circuits.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A large console with multiple screens and a locked compartment panel

items.name: evacuation protocol manual
items.description: A red binder with emergency procedures
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of Category 5 kaiju threat, activate the emergency defense system. Commander Tanaka established this facility in 2054. Access requires security clearance from the armory.

items.name: level 2 security keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with blue stripe labeled Security Level 2

items.name: cluttered desk
items.description: A desk covered with reports and coffee cups

items.name: Dr Sato research notes
items.description: A notebook filled with kaiju behavioral analysis
items.text: Research Log: The kaiju designated Titan-7 first appeared in Tokyo Bay. Our defense mechs are stored in the underground hangar. The armory contains the activation codes we need.

items.name: monitoring screens
items.description: Multiple screens showing kaiju movement patterns and city maps
items.text: ALERT: Category 5 kaiju approaching. Estimated time to impact: 45 minutes. All personnel report to stations. Defense systems offline.

items.name: reinforced armory door
items.description: A heavy steel door with a card reader and warning signs

rooms.name: Weapons Armory
rooms.description: A secure room lined with weapon racks and equipment lockers. Emergency lighting casts long shadows. A large weapons cabinet dominates one wall. Tactical gear hangs on hooks. The room smells of gun oil and metal.

items.name: locked weapons cabinet
items.description: A reinforced cabinet with a digital lock

items.name: defense system codes
items.description: A sealed envelope marked TOP SECRET
items.text: DEFENSE ACTIVATION CODES: To activate the mech defense system, answer the security questions at the hangar terminal. Q1: Who founded this facility? Q2: Where did Titan-7 first appear? Q3: What is your designation?

items.name: experimental plasma rifle
items.description: A high-tech weapon designed for kaiju combat

items.name: equipment storage locker
items.description: A tall locker with multiple compartments

items.name: personnel identification file
items.description: A folder with staff information
items.text: PERSONNEL RECORD: You are Captain Reeves, Defense Coordinator. Clearance Level: Alpha. Assigned to Kaiju Alert Command Center under Commander Tanaka. Authorized to activate all defense systems.

items.name: small cabinet key
items.description: A key labeled Weapons Cabinet Master Key

items.name: tactical equipment rack
items.description: Shelves holding helmets, vests, and communication devices

items.name: hangar access card
items.description: A red keycard marked Hangar Bay Access

items.name: hangar access door
items.description: A door with a red card reader leading to the underground hangar

rooms.name: Underground Mech Hangar
rooms.description: A massive underground hangar housing three towering defense mechs. The robots stand dormant, their metal frames gleaming under harsh fluorescent lights. A central control terminal blinks with standby indicators. Hydraulic systems hiss softly. The ceiling opens to a launch shaft leading to the surface.

items.name: defense mech Alpha
items.description: A 200-foot tall combat robot armed with plasma cannons and missile pods

items.name: defense mech Beta
items.description: A heavily armored mech equipped with energy shields and rail guns

items.name: defense mech Gamma
items.description: A fast-attack mech with blade weapons and jump jets

items.name: mech control terminal
items.description: The main activation terminal for the defense mech system. Three security questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who founded this facility?
password_questions.hint: Check the evacuation protocol manual in the control room

password_questions.question: Where did Titan-7 first appear?
password_questions.hint: Dr Sato research notes mention this location

password_questions.question: What is your designation?
password_questions.hint: Your personnel file in the armory has this information

items.name: maintenance workstation
items.description: A station with tools and diagnostic equipment

items.name: mech operations manual
items.description: A thick manual with operating procedures
items.text: MECH OPERATIONS: Once activated, the defense mechs will launch automatically to engage the kaiju threat. Estimated combat effectiveness: 87%. Good luck, Captain.

rooms.name: Mech Launch Bay
rooms.description: The hangar erupts with activity as the three defense mechs power up with a thunderous roar. Lights blaze to life across their hulls. The ceiling opens, revealing the sky above. Hydraulics hiss as the mechs move into launch position. Through the opening, you can see the massive silhouette of the approaching kaiju. The mechs launch upward in a blast of rocket fire, soaring toward the threat. Sirens wail as the defense system comes fully online.

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: A panel showing all systems green and mechs deploying successfully

items.name: tactical observation screen
items.description: A screen showing the mechs engaging the kaiju in real-time combat
items.text: COMBAT STATUS: Defense mechs engaging target. Kaiju threat level decreasing. City evacuation proceeding. Mission success probability: 94%.

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have activated the defense mech system and launched the robots to protect the city. Through the observation screens, you watch as the three mechs engage the kaiju in an epic battle. The creature is driven back into the ocean, and the city is saved. Commander Tanaka's voice crackles over the radio: 'Outstanding work, Captain Reeves. The city owes you its survival.' You win!
